data.title: World Cup 2006 (Draw and Squads)
data.meta_description:
194 teams have been narrowed down to 32 teams over 2 years.

In six months time the World Cup finals start.

The opening match is Germany vs Costa Rica...
data.text:
194 teams have been narrowed down to 32 teams over 2 years.

In six months time the World Cup finals start.

The opening match is Germany vs Costa Rica, and England have Paraguay, Trinidad & Tobago and Sweden

It was an interesting draw and here it is in full:

GROUP A

Germany

Costa Rica

Poland

Ecuador

WORLD CUP SQUADS

GROUP A

Germany

oalkeepers: Jens Lehmann (Arsenal, England), Oliver Kahn (Bayern Munich), Timo Hildebrandt (Stuttgart, Germany)

Defenders: Robert Huth (Chelsea, England), Arne Friedrich (Hertha Berlin, Germany), Marcell Jansen (Hannover, Germany), Per Mertesacker (Hannover, Germany), Christioph Metzelder (Dortmund, Germany), Jens Novotny (Leverkusen, Germany), Philipp Lahm (Bayern Munich, Germany)

Midfielders: Michael Ballack (Bayern Munich, Germany), Thorsten Frings (Werder Bremen, Germany), Tim Borowski (Werder Bremen, Germany), Thomas Hitzlsperger (Stuttgart, Germany), Bastian Schweinsteiger (Bayern Munich, Germany), Bernd Schneider (Leverkusen, Germany), Sebastian Kehl (Dortmund, Germany)

Strikers: Lukas Podolski (Koln, Germany), Gerald Asamoah (Schalke, Germany), Mike Hanke (Wolfsburg, Germany), Miroslav Klose (Werder Bremen), Oliver Neuville (Monchengladbach, Germany), David Odonkor (Dortmund, Germany)

Poland

Forwards: Maciej Zurawski (Celtic/SCO), Grzegorz Rasiak (Southampton/ENG), Ireneusz Jelen (Wisla Plock), Pawel Brozek (Wisla Cracow)
